TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConnectionPoint extends System.Object

summary.span: 做為定義連接點物件的基底類別，這些物件可讓 Web 組件連接中的消費者控制項和提供者控制項共用資料。

span.span: Serves as the base class for defining connection point objects that enable the consumer control and the provider control in a Web Parts connection to share data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個 Web 組件連接兩個共用資料的伺服器控制項所組成： 一個控制項是消費者，另一個方法是提供者。Every Web Parts connection consists of two server controls sharing data: one control is the consumer, the other is the provider. 如需 Web 組件連接，以及連接物件本身的基本元件的討論，請參閱類別概觀。For a discussion of the essential components of a Web Parts connection, and the connection object itself, see the class overview. Web 組件中的每個連接都需要連接點。Every Web Parts connection requires connection points. 提供者和消費者控制項必須具有至少一個定義可以共用 （每個 （選擇性） 可以有多個連接點） 的物件，其中包含如何將控制項可以連線到另一個控制項的資料類型它的詳細資料。The provider and the consumer control must each have at least one defined object (each of them can optionally have multiple connection points) that contains the details for how a control can connect to another control and the type of data it can share. 在實際的連線，該提供者有它自己的連接點物件類型 (衍生自基底類別)、執行個體，而且取用者有它自己的物件，執行個體。In an actual connection, the provider has its own type of connection point object (derived from the base class), a instance, and the consumer has its own object, a instance. 若要建立提供者連接點，開發人員必須加入回呼方法會傳回實作的介面執行個體的取用者的提供者。To create a provider connection point, developers must add a callback method to the provider that will return an implemented interface instance to a consumer. 它們必須標示的回呼方法，在原始程式碼與`ConnectionProvider`code 屬性 (請參閱類別)。They must mark the callback method in the source code with a `ConnectionProvider` code attribute (see the class). 同樣地，若要建立消費者連接點，開發人員必須將方法加入至取用者接收介面執行個體，而他們必須將標記與該方法`ConnectionConsumer`屬性 (請參閱類別)。Similarly, to create a consumer connection point, developers must add a method to the consumer that receives an interface instance, and they must mark that method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute (see the class). 當開發人員在網頁上建立連線時，也可以建立與靜態或動態的連接。When developers create connections on a Web page, they can be created as static or dynamic connections. 在網頁標記中宣告靜態連接。Static connections are declared in the markup of a Web page. 宣告靜態連接時，開發人員可以將指定的連接點由消費者和提供者指派值給`ProviderConnectionPointID`和`ConsumerConnectionPointID`屬性內``項目標記。When a static connection is declared, developers can designate which connection points are used for both the consumer and provider by assigning values to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` and `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attributes within the `` element tag. 這個方法是特別有用，如果有多個連接點定義內的消費者和提供者的控制項，因為它可讓靜態連線來識別要用於連線的連接點。This approach is especially useful if there are multiple connection points defined within the consumer and provider controls, because it enables the static connection to identify which connection points to use for the connection. 由開發人員的程式碼或由使用者透過使用者介面 (UI) 所提供以程式設計的方式，建立動態連接控制項。Dynamic connections are created programmatically, either by a developer's code or by users through the user interface (UI) provided by the control. 若要在程式碼中建立的連接，開發人員必須取得的執行個體藉由呼叫物件方法控制項。To create a connection in code, developers must get an instance of a object by calling the method on the control. 呼叫這個方法之前，開發人員必須消費者和提供者伺服器控制項和其各自的連接點物件的參考。Before they can call this method, developers must have references to the consumer and provider server controls and their respective connection point objects. 若要取得提供者和消費者控制項的連接點的參考，開發人員先呼叫和方法控制項。To get references to the connection points for a provider and a consumer control, developers first call the and methods on the control. 這些方法會傳回適當的連接點物件，接著可以傳遞給建立連接的方法。These methods return the appropriate connection point objects, which in turn can be passed to the method for creating a connection. 當提供者和消費者連接點物件都使用相同類型的介面，它們相容而且可用以構成直接連線至共用資料。When the provider's and the consumer's connection point objects both work with the same type of interface, they are compatible and can form a direct connection to share data. 如果無法使用相同的介面型別，物件必須用來轉譯成的型別，取用者可以使用從提供者介面執行個體。If they do not work with the same interface type, a object must be used to translate the interface instance from the provider into a type that the consumer can work with. 抽象類別提供基底由消費者和提供者的控制項所共用的連接點的詳細資料。The abstract class provides the base details of connection points that are shared by both consumer and provider controls. 多個屬性會包含這些詳細資料。Several properties contain these details. 屬性會指出連接點是否可以參與多個連線一次。The property indicates whether a connection point can participate in more than one connection at a time. 根據預設，提供者連接點可以參與多個連接，而消費者連接點不能。By default, provider connection points can participate in multiple connections, and consumer connection points cannot. 屬性會指出伺服器控制項的連接點相關聯的類型。The property indicates the type of the server control associated with a connection point. 請注意，並非只有控制項可以形成連線; 任何伺服器控制項，可以參與連接，如果放在啟用 ASP.NET 控制項、 自訂控制項，或使用者控制項，區域。Note that not only controls can form connections; any server control, whether an ASP.NET control, a custom control, or a user control, can be enabled to participate in connections if placed in a zone. 屬性會提供可顯示在 UI，以協助使用者建立連接的連接點的易記名稱。The property provides a friendly name for the connection point that can be displayed in the UI to assist users who are creating connections. 屬性做為本身的連接點物件的字串識別項。The property serves as a string identifier for the connection point object itself. 屬性指示了解哪些類型的介面執行個體的連接點。The property indicates what type of interface instance the connection point understands. 指定的連接點會提供或取用該介面的執行個體是否取決於它是否或物件。Whether a given connection point provides or consumes an instance of that interface is determined by whether it is a or a object. 類別有一個方法。The class has one method. 方法會傳回布林值，指出是否目前能夠參與連線的連接點。The method returns a Boolean value indicating whether a connection point is currently able to participate in connections. 類別也有一個公用欄位， 。The class also has one public field, . 此欄位會包含用來識別連接中的預設連接點的值。This field contains a value used to identify the default connection point in a connection. > [!NOTE] > 指定連接點方法具有只能有一個必要的參數屬性`displayName`，因此可以建立預設的連接點屬性但未指定的識別碼。The attributes for specifying connection point methods have only one required parameter, `displayName`, so it is possible to create the default connection point attribute without specifying an ID. 在這種情況下，欄位提供要使用的基底值。In such cases, the field supplies a base value to use. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立包含所需的 Web 組件連接物件。The following code example demonstrates the creation of a Web Parts connection that includes the required objects. 因為類別是抽象基底類別，它的子類別-的執行個體和-是用來建立連接的實際物件。Because the class is an abstract base class, instances of its child classes-- and --are the actual objects used to form a connection. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是主控網頁頂端附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是介面和控制項的原始程式碼。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls. 來源檔案包含一個簡單的介面，名為`IZipCode`。The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`. 另外還有名為類別`ZipCodeWebPart`，實作介面，並且會做為提供者控制。There is also a class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control. 其`ProvideIZipCode`方法是實作介面的唯一成員的回呼方法。Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member. 方法只會傳回介面的執行個體。The method simply returns an instance of the interface. 請注意，方法標示為`ConnectionProvider`中它的中繼資料屬性。Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata. 這是將方法識別提供者的連接點的回呼方法的機制。This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point. 其他類別的名稱為`WeatherWebPart`，並作為連接取用者。The other class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection. 這個類別具有名為的方法`GetZipCode`所取得的執行個體`IZipCode`介面從提供者控制。This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control. 請注意，這個方法標示為與取用者的連接點方法`ConnectionConsumer`中它的中繼資料屬性。Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata. 這是識別取用者控制項中的連接點方法的機制。This is the mechanism for identifying the connection point method in the consumer control. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 頁面頂端附近`Register`指示詞，若要註冊連接的自訂控制項和使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上顯示模式。Near the top are `Register` directives to register the custom controls that form the connection, and the user control that enables users to change display modes on the page. 連接本身以宣告方式內建立``頁面上的元素。The connection itself is created declaratively within the `` element on the page. 您也可以透過程式設計的方式; 建立連線包含執行的程式碼`Button1_Click`方法。You can also create the connection programmatically; the code for doing that is contained in the `Button1_Click` method. 以宣告方式或以程式設計方式建立連接時，是否提供者和取用者必須一律指定連接點。Whether the connection is created declaratively or programmatically, connection points must always be specified for both the provider and the consumer. `Button2_Click`方法存取物件提供者和取用者，並將部分及其屬性值寫入頁面中的標籤。The `Button2_Click` method accesses the objects for both the provider and the consumer, and writes some of their property values to a label in the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請按一下**連接點的詳細資料** 按鈕。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Connection Point Details** button. 宣告式的連接中所建立的提供者和消費者連接點相關的資訊會出現。Information about the provider and consumer connection points established in the declarative connection appears. 接下來，使用**顯示模式**切換到頁面的下拉式清單控制項的連接模式。Next, use the **Display Mode** drop-down control to switch the page into connect mode. 其中一個的動詞命令功能表控制項 （由標題列中的向下箭號表示），按一下 連接的動詞命令。On the verbs menu of one of the controls (represented by a downward arrow in the title bar), click the connect verb. 自動的連接 UI 出現時，建立``控制項在頁面中宣告。The connection UI appears, created automatically by the `` control declared in the page. 按一下**中斷連線**終止現有的連接 按鈕。Click the **Disconnect** button to terminate the existing connection. 使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式的控制項。Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode. 接下來，按一下**動態連接** 按鈕，以程式設計方式建立的連接。Next, click the **Dynamic Connection** button to create a connection programmatically. 按一下**連接點的詳細資料** 按鈕，指出兩個連接點物件的相關詳細資料。Click the **Connection Point Details** button again, to indicate details about the two connection point objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllowsMultipleConnections As Boolean
public: property bool AllowsMultipleConnections { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出連接點是否支援多個同時連接。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a connection point supports multiple simultaneous connections.

value.span: 如果連接點支援多個連接，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the connection point supports multiple connections; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件具有其屬性值設定為`true`(由類別)，因為預設的 Web 組件控制項可讓提供者連接點至多位取用者建立連接。 objects have their property value set to `true` (by the class), because the Web Parts control set by default enables provider connection points to form connections to multiple consumers. 相反地，物件具有其屬性值設定為`false`(由類別) 因為預設的 Web 組件控制項可讓取用者連接點，以連接到在只有一個提供者時間。In contrast, objects have their property value set to `false` (by the class) because the Web Parts control set by default allows consumer connection points to establish a connection to only one provider at a time. 您可以變更預設行為有關多個連線，藉由指定不同的值給屬性 （針對提供者） 或屬性 （消費者） 對這兩個使用連接屬性的類別。You can change the default behavior concerning multiple connections by assigning different values to the property (for providers) or the property (for consumers) on the two classes used for connection attributes. 如果您啟用在同一時間連接至多個提供者的消費者連接點，您的程式碼必須處理任何產生的同步處理問題。If you enable consumer connection points to connect to multiple providers at the same time, your code must deal with any resulting synchronization issues. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上兩個屬性和物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on both and objects. 這個程式碼範例示範只包含程式碼存取的屬性; 的 Web 網頁若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。This code example shows only the Web page that contains the code to access the property; for the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button2_Click`方法的網頁存取屬性在每個連接點物件，並將每個值寫入至標籤。The code in the `Button2_Click` method of the Web page accesses the property on each of the connection point objects and writes each value to a label. 執行程式碼，即可**連接點的詳細資料**按鈕之後在瀏覽器中載入的頁面。Execute the code by clicking the **Connection Point Details** button after the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ControlType As Type
public: property Type ^ ControlType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與連接點關聯之伺服器控制項的 。

span.span: Gets the of the server control with which a connection point is associated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性通常是型別。The value of the property is often the type. 不過，因為使用者控制項或伺服器控制項的任何類型可以參與連線已正確啟用並放在區域，屬性可以傳回這些其他伺服器控制項類型的其中一個。However, because any type of user control or server control can participate in connections if it is properly enabled and placed in a zone, the property can return one of these other server control types as well. 當伺服器不控制控制項置於區域，它們會包裝與物件在執行階段，讓它們可以當做控制項並加入連接中。When server controls that are not controls are placed in a zone, they are wrapped with a object at run time so they can function as controls and participate in connections. 這類控制項牽涉到在 [連線] 時，但屬性值不會傳回輸入; 它會傳回的型別物件的子控制項，也就是伺服器或使用者控制項的類型。But when such controls are involved in connections, the property value does not return the type; it returns the type of the object's child control, which is the type of the server or user control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上兩個屬性和物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on both and objects. 這個程式碼範例示範只包含程式碼存取的屬性; 的 Web 網頁若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。This code example shows only the Web page that contains the code to access the property; for the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button2_Click`方法的網頁存取屬性在每個連接點物件，並將每個值寫入至標籤。The code in the `Button2_Click` method of the Web page accesses the property on each of the connection point objects and writes each value to a label. 執行程式碼，即可**連接點的詳細資料**按鈕之後在瀏覽器中載入的頁面。Execute the code by clicking the **Connection Point Details** button after the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly DefaultID As String

summary.span: 表示字串，用來識別與伺服器控制項關聯之連接點集合中的預設連接點。

span.span: Represents a string used to identify the default connection point within a collection of connection points associated with a server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立的連接點時，很可能在取用者或提供者的原始程式碼中指定的連接點識別碼控制，請使用或屬性。When a connection point is created, it is possible to specify an ID for the connection point in the source code of a consumer or provider control, using a or a attribute. 不過，當屬性加入至原始程式碼中的連接點`ID`參數是選擇性的。However, when an attribute is added to a connection point in the source code, the `ID` parameter is optional. 如果未指定 ID 屬性中欄位會提供用來識別預設連接點的字串。If the ID is not specified in the attribute, the field provides a string that is used to identify the default connection point. 如果取用者或提供者中定義多個連接點，則必須指定每個連接點識別碼，以便建立連接時，就可以識別連接點。If multiple connection points are defined in a consumer or provider control, it is necessary to specify an ID for each connection point, so that the connection points can be distinguished when creating connections.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字串，此字串在使用者介面 (UI) 做為表示連接點的易記顯示名稱。

span.span: Gets a string that serves as a friendly display name to represent a connection point in the user interface (UI).

value.span: 字串，包含 物件的易記顯示名稱。

span.span: A string that contains a friendly display name for a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立 Web 組件的連接，連接的提供者和消費者控制項必須每個指定至少一個連接點，讓他們能夠通訊及共用資料的方法。To create a Web Parts connection, the provider and consumer controls for the connection must each specify at least one connection point, a method that enables them to communicate and share data. 若要識別這些連接點方法，開發人員會在選取的方法上指定的屬性。To identify these connection point methods, a developer specifies an attribute on the selected methods. 提供者`ConnectionProvider`屬性設定於所選的回呼方法，並在取用者，`ConnectionConsumer`接收包含資料提供者介面的執行個體的方法上設定屬性。In the provider, a `ConnectionProvider` attribute is set on the selected callback method, and in the consumer, a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute is set on the method that receives an instance of an interface that contains data from the provider. 對於這兩個屬性，永遠是必要項，不論哪一個多載宣告若要建立屬性的一個參數是`displayName`參數。For both of these attributes, the one parameter that is always required, regardless of which overload is declared to create the attribute, is the `displayName` parameter. 開發人員必須指派要當做連接點的易記顯示名稱的字串，該字串成為的值屬性。The developer must assign a string to be used as a friendly display name for the connection point, and that string becomes the value of the property. 使用者建立連接時，將會顯示網頁的 UI 中的屬性值。The property value is displayed in the UI of a Web page when users create connections. 例如，當控制項會加入至頁面上，它會建立 UI，讓使用者能夠建立控制項之間的連接。For example, when the control is added to the page, it creates a UI for users to create connections between controls. 使用者將頁面切換成連接顯示模式，然後按一下連接的動詞命令之後控制，即會出現 UI 的連線。After a user switches a page into connect display mode and clicks a connect verb on a control, the connection UI appears. 連接可參與的每個控制項列在 UI 中，而每個控制項旁會顯示其可用的連接點的易記名稱的下拉式清單控制項中。Each control that can participate in a connection is listed in the UI, and next to each control is a drop-down list control that displays the friendly names of its available connection points. 使用者必須選取至少一個連接點來建立連接。Users must select at least one connection point to establish a connection. 連接點的清單中顯示的值取自屬性。The values that appear in the list of connection points are obtained from the property. 如果開發人員建立自訂的 UI 建立連接，則可以使用類似的方式，來提供表示的連接點的易記名稱的屬性。If developers build a custom UI for creating connections, they can use the property in a similar way to provide a friendly name that represents a connection point.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetEnabled(class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed

param.name: control
param.span: 與連接點關聯的 或其他伺服器控制項。

span.span: A or other server control that is associated with a connection point.

summary.span: 傳回值，指出連接點是否可以參與連接。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a connection point can participate in connections.

returns.span: 如果控制項可以建立參與連接的連接點，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control can create a connection point to participate in a connection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的基底中類別一律會傳回`true`，但在衍生的類別可以覆寫這個方法傳回`true`或`false`不同的時間為基礎的狀態`control`。The method in the base class always returns `true`, but derived classes can override the method to return `true` or `false` at different times, based on the state of `control`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上兩個方法和物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method on both and objects. 這個程式碼範例示範只包含程式碼存取的屬性; 的 Web 網頁若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。This code example shows only the Web page that contains the code to access the property; for the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button2_Click`方法的網頁存取方法在每個連接點物件，並將每個值寫入至標籤。The code in the `Button2_Click` method of the Web page accesses the method on each of the connection point objects and writes each value to a label. 執行程式碼，即可**連接點的詳細資料**按鈕之後在瀏覽器中載入的頁面。Execute the code by clicking the **Connection Point Details** button after the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ID As String
public: property System::String ^ ID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字串，其中包含連接點的識別項。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the identifier for a connection point.

value.span: 字串，包含連接點的識別項。

span.span: A string that contains the identifier for a connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當開發人員會宣告或屬性上控制項的原始程式碼中的方法，使方法可用來當做連接點，它不需要宣告`ID`連接點屬性的參數。When a developer declares a or a attribute on a method in the source code of a control, so that the method can be used as a connection point, it is not required to declare the `ID` parameter for the connection point attribute. 只有所需的屬性`displayName`參數。The only required attribute is the `displayName` parameter. 預設識別碼指派給連接點，使用中的值欄位。A default ID is assigned to the connection point, using the value from the field. 如果只有一個方法正在做為連接點所用的控制項，則不需要指定的連接點的識別碼。If there is only one method in a control being used as a connection point, it is unnecessary to specify an ID for the connection point. 如果有多個方法指定為連接點，您必須指定每個; 識別碼否則，會擲回例外狀況。If there are multiple methods specified as connection points, you must specify an ID for each one; otherwise, an exception will be thrown. 藉由指派 ID 給每個連接點，您也能讓指定的宣告中網頁的連線，或在程式碼中建立時要使用的連接點。By assigning an ID to each connection point, you also make it possible to specify which connection point to use when you declare connections in Web pages or create them in code. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上兩個屬性和物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on both and objects. 這個程式碼範例示範只包含程式碼存取的屬性; 的 Web 網頁若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。This code example shows only the Web page that contains the code to access the property; for the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button2_Click`方法的網頁存取屬性在每個連接點物件，並將每個值寫入至標籤。The code in the `Button2_Click` method of the Web page accesses the property on each of the connection point objects and writes each value to a label. 執行程式碼，即可**連接點的詳細資料**按鈕之後在瀏覽器中載入的頁面。Execute the code by clicking the **Connection Point Details** button after the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InterfaceType As Type
public: property Type ^ InterfaceType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得連接點所使用的介面型別。

span.span: Gets the type of the interface used by a connection point.

value.span: ，對應到控制項所提供或使用的介面型別。

span.span: A that corresponds to the interface type provided or consumed by a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出哪些類型的介面連接點會使用。The property indicates what type of interface a connection point uses. 這可協助判斷兩個控制項是否相容，並且能夠建立連接。This can help to determine whether two controls are compatible and able to form a connection. 如果提供者連接點不同的消費者連接點，則兩個控制項不相容 （亦即，它們無法直接連線至沒有轉換程式），和物件必須可用來建立連接。If the provider connection point's is different from the consumer connection point's , then the two controls are incompatible (meaning that they cannot be directly connected without a transformer), and a object must be used to establish a connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上兩個屬性和物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on both and objects. 這個程式碼範例示範只包含程式碼存取的屬性; 的 Web 網頁若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。This code example shows only the Web page that contains the code to access the property; for the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button2_Click`方法的網頁存取屬性在每個連接點物件，並將每個值寫入至標籤。The code in the `Button2_Click` method of the Web page accesses the property on each of the connection point objects and writes each value to a label. 執行程式碼，即可**連接點的詳細資料**按鈕之後在瀏覽器中載入的頁面。Execute the code by clicking the **Connection Point Details** button after the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)]
